recipe.title: Frisée and Celery Salad with Toasted Fennel-Seed Dressing
ingredients: 1/2 pound frisée (French curly endive), torn into bite-size pieces (10 cups)
3 Belgian endives, cut crosswise into 1/2-inch-wide slices
3 celery ribs, thinly sliced crosswise (2 cups)
instructions: Grind fennel seeds in grinder until ground but not powdery. Transfer to a small bowl or cup, then stir in oil until combined. Let stand 15 minutes. Whisk together lemon juice, shallot, salt, and sugar in another small bowl or cup until salt and sugar are dissolved. Stir fennel oil, then add to shallot mixture in a slow stream, whisking until combined. Toss frisée, endives, and celery in a large bowl with just enough vinaigrette to coat.
